snippet.title: Distance - Adventure Campaign Story Teaser
snippet.description:
Adventure v1.0 is coming to PC on September 18th!

This massive update features tons of new content including Adventure v1.0, our mysterious single-player campaign. Learn more: http://refract.com/post/176775846236/distance-v10-coming-to-pc-on-sept-18th-new

Listen to the full music track: https://soundcloud.com/torcht/isolation

Official website: http://survivethedistance.com
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/233610/Distance/
Humble Store: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/distance

Discord: https://discord.gg/distance
Twitter: https://twitter.com/refractstudios
Facebook: https://facebook.com/refractstudios
Reddit: https://reddit.com/r/distance/
Twitch: https://twitch.tv/refractstudios

Preview the soundtrack: https://soundcloud.com/torcht
